sqls.sql: SELECT cr_dlv_h_no, cr_dlv_h_status, cr_dlv_h_status_name, cr_dlv_datetime, client_no, client_name, so_h_no, cr_dlv_h_amount, cr_dlv_h_currency, cr_dlv_h_amount_due_date, cr_dlv_h_rmk1, cr_dlv_h_rmk2, cr_dlv_h_rmk3, cr_dlv_h_rmk4, cr_dlv_h_rmk5, cr_dlv_h_rmk6, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM cr_dlv_h WHERE cr_dlv_h_no = @cr_dlv_h_no OR cr_dlv_h_id = @cr_dlv_h_id;
DELETE FROM cr_dlv_h WHERE cr_dlv_h_no = @cr_dlv_h_no OR cr_dlv_h_id = @cr_dlv_h_id;
